dialogue: Ok, so I'm sure y'all heard of glowin' but, this one's actually a trick of my own, so make sure to listen.

So pretty much, when [color=yellow]sliding downhill you gain a lot of speed[/color] right. I was thinking, what if you could channel that speed into a jump! So I [color=yellow]slide down this hill and jumped![/color]
And let me tell you I have never jumped farther in my life. I call it [color=yellow]Slide Boostin'[/color] my jump!
I think it might even be possible to [color=yellow]slide boost[/color] a jump without a hill, but I haven't quite gotten it down yet. I think you gotta be goin' real fast.
